Vivian.speaker: Vivian
Vivian.description: Bright, slightly edgy young female voice with Chinese accent
Vivian.single_text: Hello, I am Vivian, nice to meet you.
batch_texts: The weather is really nice today.
Have you eaten yet?
Let us go out and have some fun!

Serena.speaker: Serena
Serena.description: Warm, gentle young female voice with Chinese accent
Serena.single_instruct: Speak in a gentle, warm tone
batch_texts: Welcome to my channel.
I hope you enjoy this content.

Uncle_Fu.speaker: Uncle_Fu
Uncle_Fu.description: Seasoned male voice with a low, mellow timbre and Chinese accent
Uncle_Fu.single_text: Hello everyone, I am Uncle Fu.
Uncle_Fu.single_instruct: Speak in a deep, mellow tone with experience and wisdom
batch_texts: Life is like a cup of tea, you must savor it slowly.
Young people, do not rush, take your time.

Dylan.speaker: Dylan
Dylan.description: Youthful male voice with clear, natural timbre and Beijing accent
Dylan.single_text: Hey buddy, where should we hang out today?
batch_texts: This is really interesting!
Alright, no problem!

Eric.speaker: Eric
Eric.description: Lively male voice with slightly husky brightness and Sichuan accent
Eric.single_text: Hello everyone, I am Eric, welcome to Chengdu!
batch_texts: This is fantastic!
Come on in, do not be shy!

Ryan.speaker: Ryan
Ryan.description: Dynamic male voice with strong rhythmic drive
Ryan.single_text: Hello everyone, I am Ryan and welcome to my channel!
batch_texts: She sells seashells by the seashore.
Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled peppers.
How much wood would a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?

Aiden.speaker: Aiden
Aiden.description: Sunny American male voice with clear midrange
Aiden.single_text: Hey there! This is Aiden speaking, and I am excited to share this with you.
Aiden.single_instruct: Speak in a bright, friendly American accent
batch_texts: Welcome to today tutorial.
Let us get started with the basics.
Do not forget to like and subscribe!

Ono_Anna.speaker: Ono_Anna
Ono_Anna.description: Playful female voice with light, nimble timbre and Japanese accent
Ono_Anna.single_text: Hello, I am Anna. Nice to meet you.
Ono_Anna.single_instruct: Speak in a playful, cheerful tone
batch_texts: The weather is beautiful today, is it not?
Let us play together!

Sohee.speaker: Sohee
Sohee.description: Warm female voice with rich emotion and Korean accent
Sohee.single_instruct: Speak in a warm, emotional tone
batch_texts: I hope you have a wonderful day today.
Thank you so much.
